biotools.summary: This web-server was developed to identify the N6-methyladenosine (m6A). It was observed by the rigorous cross-validation test on the benchmark dataset that the accuracy achieved by the predictor in identifying m6A was 65.59%.

bioschemas.name: iRNA-Methyl
bioschemas.summary: This web-server was developed to identify the N6-methyladenosine (m6A). It was observed by the rigorous cross-validation test on the benchmark dataset that the accuracy achieved by the predictor in identifying m6A was 65.59%.
